reviewText: This video instruction DVD is much better than I expected and much better than trying to learn to use this camera by using the Sony manual. I am new to photography in general but I've been trying to study everything I can on this camera and photography in general.  So far I haven't found anything as good as this DVD and the related QuickPro Photography Tips Guide.

THIS WAS THE ONLY DVD I FOUND.
FOR MY CAMERA.
SADLY, PICTURES WORK BETTER THAN WORDS.
FOR TEACHING ME. AND THIS IS JUST PERFECT.
